revised_title: Innovative Experiments on Gun-Powder and Vent Design
tldr: The author conducted experiments to determine the most effective vent design for firearms and measure the velocities of bullets and recoil. They developed a new method for determining the velocities of all types of military projectiles and designed an accurate eprouvette for gunpowder. The experiments led to the discovery of a more efficient vent design and improved methods for measuring velocities and recoil.
